title: Flow Watch Face
summary: Flow (New Colors!) - Minimalistic beauty crafted into a Watch Face
description: Flow - Minimalistic beauty crafted into a watch face for both square and round Android Wear devices. With an abstract take on time, Flow is a watch face designed to be bold yet minimal to give your device a unique style. Wear it as a complementary style piece or even as a daily accessory.  Features   - Minimal and Yet BOLD   - Small & Translucent Notification Peek Cards   - Full Ambient Mode Support ( Low-bit & Monochrome )   - 6 Color Choices Designed and Built in the Beautiful State of ColoradoThis watch face has been rigorously tested on a Moto 360 and a square Android wear watch. However, if you find upon install that something doesn't look quite right, send me an email using the contact information and I'll work to get your problem fixed.
descriptionHTML:
Flow - Minimalistic beauty crafted into a watch face for both square and round Android Wear devices. With an abstract take on time, Flow is a watch face designed to be bold yet minimal to give your device a unique style. Wear it as a complementary style piece or even as a daily accessory.


Features


- Minimal and Yet BOLD
- Small & Translucent Notification Peek Cards
- Full Ambient Mode Support ( Low-bit & Monochrome )
- 6 Color Choices




Designed and Built in the Beautiful State of Colorado




This watch face has been rigorously tested on a Moto 360 and a square Android wear watch. However, if you find upon install that something doesn't look quite right, send me an email using the contact information and I'll work to get your problem fixed.
comments: Keeps telling me to "install settings app" and takes me back to this page. There is no additional settings app to install, I don't know where it is and I'm stuck with the default colour

Very good As others have mentioned, a few more colour options would be nice, as well as different background colours (eg, white/greys), as the colour diversity doesn't quite match the price. Overall though a very smooth and clean looking design
Looks nice but because the colors are so similar you can't use it in light. More color options are needed

Just a bit more work... Can't wait for the more color options to come out. However, it would be a lot nice if the time went closer to the edges of the display. It feels a little bit like it's adding an excessive border.
Not great Doesn't fit the g watch r very well. Should skirt around the outside of the screen
